spiritsExplanation:
The workout title "Power Pyramid Row" and description indicate a structured approach to rowing with the use of a pyramid format, which suggests interval training and progressive intensity. This supports the "Structured & Disciplined" spirit with a score of 0.6.

The mention of "Bring your rhythm up and find your groove" signals a focus on rhythm and coordination, fitting the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit, scored at 0.7. Additionally, the use of upbeat songs like 'Levitating' and 'Con Calma' aligns with this rhythmic aspect.

The imagery of rowing on the Charles River indicates a natural, outdoor setting, perfectly aligning with the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit, scoring it a 1.0. This environment provides the exploration and environmental challenge characteristic of this spirit.

Overall, the workshop's setting and structured yet flowing format create a blend of spirits, with the outdoor element being the most pronounced.
